resources.post: Shroud Of Turin DNA Indicates Global Origins |   | |   |  |   |   |   |   |   | | Shroud Of Turin DNA Indicates Global OriginsGenetic material suggests the shroud may have been created in India. | |  | | View on http://www.huffingtonpost.com | Preview by Yahoo | |  | |   | I do believe that the facts in this article are false and they want to arrive at the outcome they did so they did not properly relay the facts of the 1988 STURP.  They find a way to arrive at the outcome they want by leaving out the full facts.  It may be helpful to write a rebuttal to the alleged science used in this article, because it is imcomplete.
